heading: HR00225
0: A RESOLUTION THANKING SAN MIGUEL CORPORATION, THROUGH ITS PRESIDENT AND CHIEF OPERATING OFFICER, MR. RAMON ANG, FOR ITS BID TO DONATE ONE BILLION PESOS TO THE GOVERNMENT FOR THE PURPOSE OF BUILDING NEW DRUG REHABILITATION FACILITIES IN AREAS TO BE DETERMINED BY CONCERNED AGENCIES
